content:
I get these errors when trying to install to a Scaleway ARM64-4GB instance:

Error: Execution of '/usr/bin/apt-get -q -y -o DPkg::Options::=--force-confold install postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras' returned 100: Reading package lists...
Building dependency tree...
Reading state information...
E: Unable to locate package postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras
E: Couldn't find any package by glob 'postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras'
E: Couldn't find any package by regex 'postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras'
Error: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Postgres_appdb_base/Zulip::Postgres_appdb_base::Safepackage[postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras]/Package[postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras]/ensure: change from purged to present failed: Execution of '/usr/bin/apt-get -q -y -o DPkg::Options::=--force-confold install postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras' returned 100: Reading package lists...
Building dependency tree...
Reading state information...
E: Unable to locate package postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras
E: Couldn't find any package by glob 'postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras'
E: Couldn't find any package by regex 'postgresql-9.5-tsearch-extras'
@Steve Howell I suppose you could AMD64 instead, but it's probably not hard to add a copy of that package (which we maintain) for ARM
